QuestData.Title: Basement Dwellers
QuestData.Description:
Ever since the untimely passing of dear, sweet Lizzie, rest her soul, the pests have multiplied like crazy!
In recent days, giant spiders have begun crawling out of the cellar underneath the southern mill.
No one has been able to go down there, for fear of being wrapped in web and eaten alive!
Would you mind squashing a few arachnids and collecting any silk you find?
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect $1oa Spider Silk from the Cellar Crawlers.
QuestData.CompletionText: If only Lizzie were still here...
QuestData.RewardText: We can all rest easier now that those spiders have been squashed.
